title: Elmira Police Department names person of interest following pub shooting
content:
ELMIRA, N.Y.
As the Elmira Police Department continues investigating the shooting incident from early Thursday morning at Patrick's Pub on College St. in Elmira, a 'person of interest' has been named.
WETM-TV in Elmira reports that 27-year-old Zecary Banks of Elmira has been named as the 'person of interest' in the shooting incident which resulted in five people being hospitalized.
Of the five shooting victims, four remain in the hospital as of 3:45 p.m.
Banks is described as a black male, standing 6'01" tall, weighing 220 lbs. He was last seen wearing a black shirt, light colored shorts and a red baseball hat.
Any witnesses to this shooting or anyone with information about Banks' possible whereabouts is encouraged to call the Elmira Police Department at (607) 737-5626 or the anonymous tip line at (607) 271-HALT.
